text:
DID MY MESSENGER FISH
JUST TELL YOU MY EVIL PLAN?
NO.

ALL RIGHT,
THIS TIME,
PAY ATTENTION.
DEAR MAMA,

YOU'LL BE PROUD
TO KNOW

THAT AFTER
THE 12 BALL
TOURNAMENT

REVEALS THE BEST
YOUNG WIZARD,

I WILL DRAI--
[MUFFLED]

OK, MAYBE HE DID
TELL ME.

SHE IS NOT MY MOTHER,
YOU STUPID FISH.

HEY, AT LEAST
I DIDN'T TELL HER
ABOUT VOLCANOLAND.

I NEVER SAID ANYTHING
ABOUT VOLCANOLAND.

WELL,
YOU HAVE TO GO TO
AN UNDERSEA VOLCANO

TO DRAIN
A WIZARD'S POWERS,

AND VOLCANOLAND IS
THE ONL--[GLUB]
WE HAVE A PROBLEM.
YOU JUST HEARD MY PLAN.
AND I LOVE YOUR PLAN.

I THINK
IT'D BE GREAT FOR ME

IF JUSTIN WINS
THE TOURNAMENT
AND YOU DRAIN HIS POWERS.
HOW SO?
BECAUSE WITHOUT HIS POWERS,

THERE'S NO WAY HE'LL END UP
BEING THE FAMILY WIZARD.

I WILL. WELL, OF COURSE,
THERE'S MAX,

BUT HE THINKS MICROWAVE
POPCORN'S MAGIC, SO...

HMM. WELL, IT LOOKS LIKE
WE'RE ON THE SAME SIDE.

CARE TO SEAL IT
WITH A DIABOLICAL LAUGH?
I'LL TRY.
WHAH HA HA HA HA, HA?
NNN. NEEDS MORE BASS.
MWAH HA HA HA HA HA!

I THOUGHT
I HEARD VOICES.

GOOD EVENING,
HEADMASTER CRUMBS.

JUST HERE WITH ONE
OF MY PRIZE STUDENTS.

REALLY? ALEX RUSSO IS
ONE OF YOUR PRIZE STUDENTS?

ALL THE OTHER TEACHERS SAY
SHE'S REMARKABLY SLACK,

AND YOU KNOW HOW
WE FEEL ABOUT SLACKERS.
WE DON'T LIKE SLACKERS.

HEH. PERHAPS THEY
DON'T KNOW MISS RUSSO
AS WELL AS I DO.

WELL, THEN, PERHAPS I
SHOULD STICK AROUND AND
GET TO KNOW YOU, TOO.

NOW, WHAT ARE WE
TALKING ABOUT?

UH, JUST GIRL TALK--
BRAS AND STUFF.

OH. WELL, IT'S--
I'VE GOT TO GO.

♪ WELL, YOU KNOW EVERYTHING'S
GONNA BE A BREEZE ♪

♪ THAT THE END WILL NO DOUBT
JUSTIFY THE MEANS ♪

♪ YOU CAN FIX ANY PROBLEM
WITH THE SLIGHTEST OF EASE ♪
♪ YES, PLEASE ♪

♪ BUT YOU MIGHT FIND OUT
IT'LL GO TO YOUR HEAD ♪

♪ WHEN YOU WRITE A REPORT
ON A BOOK YOU NEVER READ ♪

♪ WITH A SNAP OF YOUR FINGERS,
YOU CAN MAKE YOUR BED ♪

♪ THAT'S WHAT I SAID ♪
♪ AHH ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN GET
ALL YOU WANTED ♪
♪ IN YOUR WILDEST DREAMS ♪

♪ YOU MIGHT RUN INTO TROUBLE
IF YOU GO TO EXTREMES ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪
♪ AHH ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN HAVE WHAT YOU
WANT BY THE SIMPLEST OF MEANS ♪

♪ BE CAREFUL NOT TO MESS
WITH THE BALANCE OF THINGS ♪
♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING IS NOT ♪
♪ WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

FORGET THE WAVERLY
SUB STATION.
THEY USE DAY-OLD BREAD.

BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE EAT
AT THE SALAD BOWL.

LOTS OF ATTRACTIVE WOMEN
EAT SALADS THESE DAYS.
[GASPS] LOOK AT THIS.

NO WONDER WE HAD
SUCH A SLOW DAY.

UH, EXCUSE ME.
WHAT DO YOU THINK
YOU'RE DOING?

IT'S NOT HALLOWEEN,
AND YOU'RE A LITTLE
TOO OLD

TO BE TRICK-OR-TREATING
ANYWAY.

LISTEN, IF YOU DON'T
MIND, WHY DON'T YOU

STAND IN FRONT OF
THE CLOWN SUPPLY?

I THINK YOU'D FIT IN
BETTER OVER THERE.
I HAVE TO STAND HERE,

BECAUSE I'M STEALING
YOUR CUSTOMERS

WITH MY CRISP LETTUCE
AND CRUNCHY CUCUMBERS.
YOU CAN'T DO THAT.

THAT'S WHAT
THE HOT DOG GUY

IN WASHINGTON
SQUARE PARK SAID.

NOW HE'S THE GUY
HOLDING THE ARROW

POINTING TOWARD
"CHEAP FURNITURE
GOING OUT OF BUSINESS."

SO BACK OFF,
MEAT EATERS.

LISTEN, YOU TALKING
BOWL OF FREAK.

YOU ARE NOT GONNA
STEAL OUR CUSTOMERS.

SUBMARINE SANDWICHES
HAVE A LONG HISTORY
IN NEW YORK CITY,

AND I KNOW
NEW YORKERS,

AND NEW YORKERS
 LOVE SANDWICHES,

AND THEY'RE NOT JUST
GONNA GIVE 'EM UP

FOR TOMATOES,
CARROTS, AND--

WHAT ARE THOSE?
SNAILS?
THEY'RE PORCINI MUSHROOMS.

OH! I LOVE
PORCINI MUSHROOMS.
JERRY! GET INSIDE.

OK, LOOK,
ALL WE HAVE TO DO IS
ADVERTISE OUR SHOP

LIKE SHE
 ADVERTISES HERS.

WHERE ARE WE GONNA
FIND A GOOF

TO WEAR A RIDICULOUS
COSTUME FOR US?

[BRITISH ACCENT]
IT'S TIME FOR THE
SERVE-AND-VOLLEY DRILL.

YOU SERVE. I VOLLEY.
YOU CRY FOR MERCY.
AHH!
I WASN'T READY.

UH, JUSTIN. HEH.
CAN I TALK TO YOU?

UH, I KINDA NEED
TO PRACTICE.

I'M PLAYIN'
IN THE SEMIFINALS TOMORROW.

NO, YOU'RE NOT.
DR. EVILINI'S
GONNA DRAIN

THE 12 BALL CHAMPION'S
POWERS AT VOLCANOLAND.

I CAN'T LET YOU
WIN THIS THING.

I'M SORRY.
VOLCANO WHAT?

HER MESSENGER FISH
TOLD ME.

SHE WANTS TO BECOME
THE MOST POWERFUL
WIZARD EVER.

SO THERE'S A VOLCANO
AND A MESSENGER FISH.

WE NEED TO FOCUS
ON EVILINI.

I DON'T KNOW IF YOU
KNOW, BUT SHE'S EVIL.
NO. HER NAME'S EVILINI.

AND HOW MUCH CLEARER
COULD IT BE?

OK, IF SHE WAS
REALLY EVIL,

DON'T YOU THINK SHE WOULD
HAVE CHANGED HER NAME
TO REALLYFRIENDLY-INI

OR NICE-INI OR
TOTALLY-NOT-EVILINI?

ALL RIGHT, WE'RE NOT
GETTING ANYWHERE.

YOU NEED
TO LISTEN TO ME.

THIS IS EXACTLY WHY
I DIDN'T WANT YOU
TO COME TO WIZ TECH.

STOP BOTHERING ME.
I NEED TO FOCUS
AND CONCENTRATE.

[WHACK]
AHH!

IF I COULD FOCUS,
I WOULD'VE HIT THOSE.
HUMPH. THERE SHE IS,
WORKIN' THE STREETS.
HMM. GO GET HER, MAX.
MAX.

HEY, HOW'D YOU GET IT
TO SMELL LIKE ONIONS?
UHH. THAT'S YOU.

JERRY,
IT NEEDS MORE
VENTILATION HOLES.

THAT'S WHY WE WENT
WITH SWISS CHEESE.

NOW, GO GET
THOSE CUSTOMERS.

YEA--OHH!
[GASPS]
MAXIE, ARE YOU OK?
SORRY, BUDDY.

JUST GET ME UP BEFORE
THE 3-SECOND RULE KICKS IN.

GET YOUR BRONX-STRAMI
CENTRAL PORK SANDWICH

RIGHT HERE
AT THE SUB STATION!
MMM.
HEY, IT'S WORKING.
THAT'S MY BOY.

SALADS MAKE
YOU PERKY!

SANDWICHES
MAKE YOU SLEEPY.

HEH. KNOW WHY PEOPLE
EAT SALAD WITH A ROLL?

BECAUSE IT
MAKES A SANDWICH
IN THEIR STOMACHS.

YOU HAVE
TO EAT SANDWICHES

WITH YOUR HANDS
LIKE SAVAGES.
SALADS ARE UN-AMERICAN!

ALL RIGHT, YOU WON
THIS LUNCH RUSH,

BUT IF YOU'RE
HERE TOMORROW,
YOU'RE GONNA GET IT.
OOH, I AM SCARED OF LETTUCE.

IT'S HIGH IN VITAMINS
AND FIBER. HOO HOO HOO

HEADMASTER CRUMBS,
I NEED YOUR HELP.

[MOUTH FULL]
WHAT SEEMS TO BE
THE PROBLEM?

DR. EVILINI'S GONNA
DRAIN THE 12 BALL
CHAMPION'S POWERS

AT VOLCANOLAND,
AND I THINK MY BROTHER
MAY END UP CHAMPION.

YOU HAVE TO
DO SOMETHING.

I CAN'T.
MY HANDS ARE TIED.

[SIGHS] YOU DON'T
BELIEVE ME EITHER?

NO. MY HANDS
ARE REALLY TIED.

I LOST A BET
WITH EVILINI.

PROFESSOR MALONEY AND I
GOT INTO A BEARD CONTEST

OF WHICH I HAD NO BUSINESS
BEING PART OF.

DON'T YOU SEE?
THAT BET WAS A SETUP.

EVILINI HAS TIED YOUR
HANDS SO YOU CAN'T DO
ANYTHING ABOUT IT.
YOU MAY BE ONTO SOMETHING,

BUT I CAN'T
CONFRONT EVILINI.
SHE'D ONLY DENY IT.

LOOK, IF YOU WANT
TO PROTECT JUSTIN,
IT'S UP TO YOU.

GET HIM TO BACK OUT
OF THE TOURNAMENT.

I ALREADY TRIED, BUT ONCE
I MENTIONED VOLCANOLAND
AND THE TALKING FISH,

HE THOUGHT I WAS
MESSING WITH HIM.

MMM. SOUNDS LIKE YOU
NEED SOME HARD EVIDENCE

TO CONVINCE
YOUR BROTHER.

I SUGGEST
YOU KNUCKLE DOWN
AND GO TO THE LIBRARY.

SURE. I'LL GO
TO THE LIBRARY.
OH, REALLY?
IS THAT THE TRUTH?
SURE.

SOME ARE EVIL,
SOME ARE KIND,

BUT NOW ALL MUST
SPEAK THEIR MIND.

I HATE LIBRARIES.
WHAT AM I SAYING?

THERE'S NO WAY
 I'M GOING TO A LIBRARY.
 WHAT AM I SAYING?

I PUT A TRUTH SPELL
ON YOU TO SEE

IF YOU'RE REALLY
ON YOUR WAY
TO HELP JUSTIN

OR IF YOU'RE
JUST GOING TO
SLACK OFF AGAIN.

[SIGHS] I WANNA HELP,
BUT NOT AT A BORING LIBRARY.

WELL, THEN GO SOMEPLACE
WHERE IT ISN'T BORING,
LIKE, UM, VOLCANOLAND.

HOW DO I GET
TO VOLCANOLAND?
I CAN'T TELL YOU THAT.

THEN WHY DID YOU
TELL ME TO GO THERE?

I DIDN'T.
I WOULD NEVER SAY THAT.
I'M THE HEADMASTER.

I CAN'T SEND
A STUDENT OFF CAMPUS
TO VOLCANOLAND.
WHAT?

YOU SHOULD NEVER
GO TO VOLCANOLAND.
IT COULD BE DANGEROUS.

SO JUST TO BE CLEAR,
YOU WANT ME TO GO
TO VOLCANOLAND?
I DIDN'T SAY THAT.

BUT YOU DID SAY,
"VOLCANOLAND."
I WILL ADMIT TO THAT.
WHAT'S HAPPENING?

JUSTIN'S
FALLEN BEHIND.

AH. GOOD. MAYBE I DON'T
HAVE TO GO TO VOLCANOLAND.

THE ONLY WAY
 HE COULD WIN NOW

IS IF HE HITS
THE TATTLER.
TATTLER?

YEAH,
 IT'S AN OBSCURE RULE.

IF YOU HIT
THE TATTLER,
IT'S AN AUTOMATIC WIN.

BUT THE TATTLER
ISN'T EVEN IN HERE,
SO THERE'S NO CHANCE.
HEY, THERE SHE IS.
WHAT'S SHE DOING?

SHE'S TATTLING.
SHE'S THE TATTLER.
IT'S OBVIOUS.

HE DID IT!
HE HIT THE TATTLER!
[CHEERING]
I WON!

I'M GOIN'
TO THE FINALS!
WELL PLAYED, RUSSO.

IT'S NOW DOWN
TO YOU AND JERKO.

WE'LL SOON FIND OUT
WHO'S THE MOST POWERFUL
YOUNG WIZARD.
[CACKLE]
OH. SORRY. MY CELLPHONE.
HELLO. MUMMY?

OK, I'VE GOT TO GET
TO VOLCANOLAND.

OH, I GUESS IT'S JUST
YOU, ME, AND DESTINY.

NO. DESTINY JOHNSON
LOST IN THE THIRD ROUND.

NO, DESTINY,
AS IN IT'S MY DESTINY
TO BE A WINNER

AND YOUR DESTINY
TO ALWAYS LIVE
IN MY SHADOW.

WELL, I'LL SEE YOU
IN THE FINALS, JERK.

HOW AM I GONNA GET
TO VOLCANOLAND?

I'D MAIL MYSELF,
BUT ALL THE MAIL

GOES THROUGH
DR. EVILINI,
AND SHE'S EVIL.

I WORKED
IN THE MAILROOM.

I COULD GET AROUND
EVILINI.

ARE YOU SAYING YOU COULD
MAIL ME FROM THE MAILROOM
WITHOUT EVILINI KNOWING?

I'M NOT SAYING THAT
AT ALL.

WHAT IS IT WITH YOU PEOPLE
AND YOUR HEAD NODDING?
W-WAIT.
EXCUSE ME.

I NEED SOME INFORMATION
ABOUT THE VOLCANO.
FIRE AWAY.

WE'RE ENCOURAGED
TO USE VOLCANO TERMINOLOGY
WHENEVER WE CAN.

IS IT TRUE THE VOLCANO
CAN DRAIN WIZARDS
OF THEIR POWERS?

THE MAJORITY OF WIZARDS
ENJOY THE NATURAL WONDER
OF THE PARK

AND TAKE A LOT OF PICTURES
THAT THEY'LL BORE THEIR FRIENDS
WITH WHEN THEY GET HOME.
WHAT ABOUT THE OTHERS?
OH.

THEY USE THE VOLCANO
TO DRAIN WIZARDS
OF THEIR POWERS.

THAT'S A SEPARATE
ENTRANCE FEE.

I HAVE TO PROVE THIS
TO MY BROTHER BEFORE
IT'S TOO LATE.

HEY, COULD YOU COME BACK
TO SCHOOL WITH ME?

WHAT FOR?
YOU GOT SOMETHIN' BUBBLING?

HEH HEH.
SEE WHAT I DID THERE?

YOU'RE
A VOLCANO OFFICIAL.

MY BROTHER
ALWAYS BELIEVES PEOPLE
IN UNIFORM.

IT'S ONE OF THE MANY
THINGS ABOUT HIM
THAT ANNOY ME.

DOES IT MAKE YOU
WANNA ERUPT?

OK, NOW YOU'RE
PUSHING IT.

DOES IT BLOCK YOUR FLOW?
STOP IT.

DOES IT MAKE YOU
WANNA GO MOLTEN?
DON'T.

MAKE YOU HOT
UNDER THE COLLAR?

OH, OFFICIALLY
IGNORING YOU.

ALEX, WHAT ARE
YOU DOING?

WHO'S SHE?
HELLO.

I'M THE INFORMATION
DESK LADY FROM
VOLCANOLAND.

GO AHEAD, JUSTIN.
ASK HER A QUESTION.

COULD I GET ONE
OF THOSE UNIFORMS?

I LIKE THE FRINGE THINGS
ON THE SHOULDERS.

NO. A QUESTION
ABOUT VOLCANOLAND.
JUST TELL HIM.

AT VOLCANOLAND,
MORE WIZARDS

HAVE BEEN DRAINED
OF THEIR POWERS

THAN AT ALL OF
THE 77 WONDERS OF THE
WIZARD WORLD COMBINED.

WIZARDS COME
 FROM NEAR AND FAR

TO WITNESS ITS AWESOME
WIZARD-POWER-DRAINING
PROPERTIES.

OK, SO YOU WEREN'T
MESSIN' WITH ME
ABOUT VOLCANOLAND,

BUT THAT DOESN'T
MEAN EVILINI'S

TAKING ME THERE
TO DRAIN MY POWERS.
DR. EVILINI?

OH, SHE HAS
A SEASON PASS

TO THE
DRAINING
SECTION,

AND SHE
PAID EXTRA,

SO THERE'S NO
BLACKOUT DATES.

I GOTTA QUIT
THE TOURNAMENT.

WHILE I'M HERE,
WOULD YOU LIKE TO BUY

AN "I LAVA VOLCANOLAND"
T-SHIRT?

NO, I DON'T
WANNA BUY AN "I LAVA
VOLCANOLAND" T-SHIRT?

BECAUSE I DON'T-A
LAVA VOLCANOLAND.

HE DIDN'T HAVE TO
BLOW HIS TOP.
OK, I'VE HAD ENOUGH.

YOU WANT ME
TO GO DORMANT?

STOP IT.
OK.

TRY A SALAD RIGHT
AROUND THE CORNER.

HEY, LETTUCE HEAD,
KEEP MOVIN'.

I WARNED YOU ABOUT
COMIN' BACK HERE,
SHORTY.
WHOA! UHH!

I DIDN'T WANNA DO THIS,
BUT YOU'VE GIVEN ME NO CHOICE.

IT'S TIME FOR THE SALAD
TO GET A LITTLE MEAT IN IT.
CUCKOO!
HEY, SALAD BOWL GIRL!
REMEMBER ME?
WELL, LET ME HELP YOU OUT.

I'M THE GUY
IN THE HOT DOG SUIT.

YOU THOUGHT YOU RAN ME
OUT OF THE BIZ WITH
THAT FURNITURE ARROW,
BUT I'M NOT GOIN' ANYWHERE.
CUCKOO!

OH, LOOK. THE REST OF
THE COMBO MEAL IS HERE.
HEH HEH.
I CAN'T BELIEVE IT.

I HAVE ALWAYS
WANTED TO SAY THIS.

I JUST NEVER IMAGINED IT
BEING THIS GREAT.
FOOD FIGHT!
HI-YAH!
HI-YAH!

LET ME UP!
YOU CAN'T DO THIS!
HAD ENOUGH?
YES, I'VE HAD ENOUGH.

MY LETTUCE
WAS ON THE GROUND.

I'M A WALKIN'
HEALTH CODE VIOLATION.
AW, THANKS, GUYS.

WE GOT HER.
WE GOT SALAD BOWL GIRL.

DR. EVILINI, ALEX TOLD
ME ABOUT YOUR EVIL PLAN.

I'M NOT PLAYIN'
IN THE 12 BALL FINAL.
JUSTIN, JUSTIN, JUSTIN.
I DON'T HAVE AN EVIL PLAN.

OF COURSE ALEX DOESN'T
WANT YOU TO HAVE THE 12 BALL
CHAMPIONSHIP BELT.

THAT WOULD MAKE YOU A SHOO-IN
TO BE THE ONE IN YOUR FAMILY
TO KEEP YOUR WIZARD POWERS.

THERE'S
A CHAMPIONSHIP BELT?
MM-HMM.

NICE TRY, EVILINI.
I'M ONTO YOU.

THE VOLCANOLAND
INFORMATION DESK LADY
TOLD ME.

[GASPS] SHE GAVE ME
A DISCOUNT ON MY
VOLCANOLAND PARK PASS!
I STILL HATE HER.

THE POINT IS
I WANNA KEEP MY POWERS,
SO I'M DONE. I QUIT.

I'M OUTTA HERE.
YOU CAN'T QUIT.

I NEED TO KNOW WHO'S
THE MOST POWERFUL
YOUNG WIZARD.

SCRITTI POLITTI,
NO-QUITTI!

OK, I DON'T KNOW WHAT
YOU JUST DID TO ME,
BUT I STILL QUIT--
I STILL QUIT THE F-F-F-
YOU CAN'T QUIT NOW.

I PUT A NO-QUIT SPELL
ON YOU.
I QUI--I QUI--

I WANT TO PLAY.
OH, NO. WHAT AM I SAYING?
WHAT AM I DOING?
GIVE ME MY PADDLES!

I DON'T WANT THEM.
I'M GONNA WIN. NO, YOU'RE NOT.
THEN WHAT--[STAMMERS]

HEY, YOU GUYS,
I HAVE GREAT NEWS.

JUSTIN'S GONNA QUIT
THE TOURNAMENT.

WHY WOULD HE QUIT?
THAT'S NOT GOOD NEWS.
I CAN EXPLAIN. SEE--

[AMPLIFIED] WIZARDS,
STUDENT WIZARDS,

VISITING PARENTS,
GOBLINS AND GHOULS,
LARRY...

WELCOME TO THE WIZ TECH
12 BALL FINALS.

OUR FIRST COMPETITOR--
WELL, WHAT CAN I SAY?
HIS NAME SAYS IT ALL.
JERKO PHOENIX!
[BOOING]
[BOOING QUIETS]
[BOOING]

AND A NEWCOMER
TO THE SPORT AND
SERIOUS THREAT

EVEN THOUGH HE
DOESN'T LOOK LIKE IT,
JUSTIN RUSSO!
[CHEERING]
HI, MOM.

OH, LOOK.
HE'S WAVING AT US.

I DON'T WANNA
BE HERE.
I LOVE YOU, TOO.

WHAT IS HE DOING HERE?
I TOLD HIM NOT TO PLAY.

YOU NEED TO BE
MORE SUPPORTIVE
OF YOUR BROTHER.

I'M TRYING TO SAVE
HIS POWERS FROM GETTING
SUCKED DOWN A VOLCANO.

[SIGHS] WE REALLY
SHOULD GET HER INTO
A CREATIVE WRITING CLASS.
WHAT ARE YOU DOING?

DR. EVILINI
PUT A SPELL ON ME.
I CAN'T QUI--[STAMMERS]
FIRST SERVE, RUSSO.

HE'S GOTTA LOSE.
LOSE, JUSTIN! LOSE!
ALEX!
Crowd: OOH!

I DIDN'T MEAN
TO DO THAT.
WAY TO GO, SON!

GET YOUR EYE
ON THE BALLS!
MISS IT!
Crowd: OOH!

CAN SOMEONE
PLEASE STOP ME?

OH, MY GOSH.
THEY'RE UP TO 11 BALLS.

NO ONE'S EVER GOTTEN
TO 12 BEFORE.

THE 12th BALL!
GET IT, JUSTIN!
[CROWD GASPING]
WE HAVE A WINNER!
[CHEERING]
I CAN'T BELIEVE IT!

MY BROTHER'S
THE CHAMPION! WHOO!

CONGRATULATIONS,
JUSTIN RUSSO.

YOU ARE THE BEST 12 BALL
PLAYER IN THE ENTIRE SCHOOL.

WHAT ARE YOU
GOING TO DO NOW?

I'M GOIN'
TO VOLCANOLAND!
EHH!
YOU CERTAINLY ARE.
[CACKLES]

THAT'S IT.
IT'S OVER.

I'VE TRIED
EVERYTHING.

I JUST CAN'T
BEAT EVILINI.

JUSTIN'S GONNA
LOSE HIS POWERS.

WHO ARE YOU
TALKING TO, HONEY?
NOT NOW.
HERE'S AN IDEA.

I AM TALKING
TO MYSELF.

SOME ARE EVIL,
SOME ARE KIND,

BUT NOW ALL MUST
SPEAK THEIR MIND.
SO IT'S JUSTIN. [CACKLES]

I'LL TAKE HIM
TO THE VOLCANO

AND DRAIN HIS POWERS
FOR MYSELF.

WHY AM I SAYING THIS?
OH, NO. TRUTH SPELL.

THEY'LL ALL HEAR
MY PLAN TO BECOME
THE MOST POWERFUL WIZARD!
STOP TALKING.
SECURITY!

I KNEW
YOU COULD DO IT.

YOU WENT TO GREAT
LENGTHS TO HELP
YOUR BROTHER,

AND YOU'VE BROUGHT
EVILINI DOWN.

WHEN YOU APPLY
YOURSELF,

YOU CAN ACHIEVE
A LOT MORE THAN
YOU THINK.
I GUESS I CAN.

HEY, UH, WHEN YOU
WERE AT VOLCANOLAND,

DID YOU HAPPEN TO BUY
A T-SHIRT IN MY SIZE?

UH, YEAH. THEY'RE
GONNA MAIL IT TO YOU.

MM-HMM. SOME ARE EVIL,
SOME ARE--

OK, MAYBE I DIDN'T,
BUT NEXT TIME, OK?
OK.

OH, JUSTIN, HONEY,
ARE YOU OK?
YEAH, THANKS TO ALEX.

I CAN'T BELIEVE
MY BABY ALMOST

HAD HIS POWERS DRAINED
IN A VOLCANO.
WE WERE VERY CONCERNED.

YOU STILL GET TO KEEP
THE CHAMPIONSHIP BELT,
THOUGH, RIGHT?
ALEX, I'M KINDA GLAD

YOU CAME
TO SUMMER SCHOOL
WITH ME AFTER ALL.

THANKS FOR STOPPIN'
EVILINI FROM
STEALIN' MY POWERS.

SO FROM NOW ON,
YOU'LL BELIEVE ME?

YOU KNOW WHAT?
I WILL.

I THINK YOU'VE
GROWN UP A LOT
THIS SUMMER.
YEAH. ME, TOO.

OH, YOU HAD SOMETHING
ON YOUR SHIRT.

I'M NOT FALLIN'
FOR IT THIS TIME.
YEAH, I SAW THAT COMIN'.

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY--ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

ISN'T THIS THE STRANGEST
THING YOU HAVE EVER SEEN?
NO. IT'S A DREAM COME TRUE.

GIANT THINGS
EATING WHAT THEY ARE.

HEH. COME ON.
WHO HASN'T HAD THAT DREAM?

IF A GIANT CLAW
COMES OUT OF THE SKY

AND GRABS ONE OF 'EM,
THEN I'VE HAD THAT DREAM.
THAT'S WEIRD.

CAPTIONING PERFORMED BY
THE NATIONAL CAPTIONING
INSTITUTE, INC.
